com.chrisdoyle.validation

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chrisdoyle.validation.Main

  • public class Main
extends Object
    Command line junit test runner for Gradle-Fury validation borrowed from Apache jUDDI's TCK Test Runner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String[] allArtifacts
      all artifacts that are expected to be published to maven local

      all artifacts that are expected to be signed, in the gradle build folders

      the folder you're running this jar from.

      some location to gpg, loaded from gradle.properties

      raw access to everything in gradle.properties
      (package private) static Class[] normalTests
      run these tests after 'gradlew install -Pprofile=sources,javadoc
      (package private) static Class[] noSignatureTests
      run these tests after 'gradlew install -Pprofile=sources,javadoc' 'gradlew publishArtifacts -Pprofile=sources,javadoc'
      (package private) static Class[] signatureTests
      run these tests after 'gradlew install -Pprofile=sources,javadoc' 'gradlew publishArtifacts -Pprofile=sources,javadoc,sign'
      (package private) static Class[] siteTests 
      static String version
      from gradle.properties, pom.version
